term.title: transient-stimulated emission pumping

item.text: Transient-spectroscopy technique in which the excited state dynamics is probed via stimulating the molecular species from the photo-excited state (produced by a short pump pulse) back to the ground state by means of a short dump pulse at various pumpâ€“dump time delays.
